<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns all named layers used by [[cutRsc]], [[cutText]], [[cutObj]] or [[cutFadeOut]]. The layer normally would be added on the first use of any of the aforementioned commands, however if a layer needs to be reserved it could be done like so: <br><tt>_layerNum <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> "myLayerName" [[cutFadeOut]] 0;</tt>.<br><br> The index of the layer name in the array corresponds to the layer number the cut effect will be displayed on. If no layers were defined, the return is [""], because 0 layer is reserved for usage in cut commands without layer param or when name of the layer given is empty "". </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''allCutLayers'''</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of [[Strings]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allLayers = [[allCutLayers]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[cutRsc]], [[cutText]], [[cutObj]], [[cutFadeOut]], [[allActiveTitleEffects]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
